About Me

The inception of my pivot to tech occurred when I was volunteering in Southeast Asia. Witnessed the immediate impact of how these web/mobile applications and tools were changing their lives and giving them a better chance of economic mobility to improve living standards for their family and their community.

City College of San Francisco
Cyber Security Club

Full Stack Developer and Project Manager

Tech lead, responsible for leading a team of three engineers. Intrumental on UX/UI design, code collaboration and code review. Worked remotely and onsite. Used GitHub for workflow, Slack for communication and Waffle.io for task management.

AEIMSKEI
Travel with a Purpose

Full Stack Developer, Content & Media Manager

A one-stop shop for insights on alternative traveling, explore reponsibly, with a purpose and meaning. Collaborate with local writers to share their tips on what guests can do while visiting their country. Bridging communities in a socially conscious way.

Technical Skills
Constantly learning

Programming Languages

JavaScript, Node.js, Express, React, RESTful architecture, CRUD, SQL, NoSQL, Python, Flask, Jinja2, Ruby on Rails, PHP, HTML, CSS, Flexbox, Sass, WordPress and deploy on Heroku. Life-long learner and loves collaborating in teams!
